author: Volik
long_description:
# Speed Manipulation
Change your movement speed. In order to run any of the commands, you will need the `change_speed` privilege. There are also some settings which you can change.
## Commands
To set your speed, run: `/set_speed <speed>` where `<speed>` is a number determining your movement speed.
To reset your speed to default: `/reset_speed`.
## Note
After death the speed will reset.
name: speed_manipulation
title: Speed Manipulation
